meanings.sent1: The flowers in the garden were truly eyesome.
meanings.sent2: The sunset over the ocean was so eyesome.
meanings.sent3: The eyesome painting made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like eyesome jewels sparkling in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The eyesome scenery took my breath away.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is visually appealing.
meanings.sent1: She was considered the eyesome of the party.
meanings.sent2: The new sports car was an eyesome on the road.
meanings.sent3: The eyesome of the group always attracted attention.
meanings.sent4: The eyesome of the town, the old lighthouse stood tall and proud.
meanings.sent5: The eyesome of the exhibit was the stunning sculpture in the center.
